job.name: LcKppi
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} set Name = `basename $PWD` # setenv NODEBUG yes setenv STARFPE NO # setup 64b # starver TFG19g echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set N = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # set name = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else exit 1; endif set name = "" # foreach name (K_S0 Lambda0Z200cm Lambda0Z200cmFlat Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega HyperTriton) foreach name (K_S0Fixed Lambda0_barFixed Lambda0Fixed XiM_barFixed XiMFixed Omega_barFixed OmegaFixed AntiHyper2NeutronFixed AntiHyperH4Fixed AntiHyperNeutronFixed AntiHyperTritonFixed Hyper2NeutronFixed HyperH4Fixed HyperNeutronFixed HyperTritonFixed \ K_S0 Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega AntiHyper2Neutron AntiHyperH4 AntiHyperNeutron AntiHyperTriton Hyper2Neutron HyperH4 HyperNeutron HyperTriton) echo $Name | grep $name if (! $?) break; # if ($name == $Name) break; end echo "name = $name"; if ($name == "") exit 1; set noiTPClu = "" echo $Name | grep 'noiTPClu' if (! $?) set noiTPClu = ",noiTPClu"; # setenv StarEndMakerShell # set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,VFMinuitX,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; set chain = "MC.2018,vmc,VMCAlignment,UseMCTstart,NoiTPCLu,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}${noiTPClu}; # set sdt = ",sdt20180426.135000" set sdt = ",sdt20180531.080000" set VFMCE = ",VFMCE"; set Chain = ${chain}${VFMCE}${sdt}",Rung."${rung} set base = ${name}_${rung}_${f}_${N}; set file = ${base}.MuDst.root set tag = ${base}.tags.root set logFile = ${base}B.log echo "${file}" if (-r ../xyz.root) ln -s ../xyz.root PVxyz.root if ( ! -r ${file}) then root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('${f}','${N}',"'${Chain}'",0,"'${file}'","'${tag}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
